The video was published on Twitter on Ma: 2021, alongside a purported Chinese translation of Putin's speech and has been viewed over 102,000 times.
The Chinese: language caption of the post translates in English as Putin's statement criticizing world leaders and their evil plan to deliberately eliminate the world's population.
The on: screen French subtitles in the video correspond with the post's Chinese caption.
A keyword search on Google found a press: 2016, which shows Putin speaking during a military parade and has no mention of the criticism towards world leaders.
